pull.title: utils: Convert Windows args to utf-8 string
pull.body: Create a new class `WinCmdLineArgs` when building for Windows. It converts all command line arguments to utf8 string.

events.body:
<!--e57a25ab6845829454e8d69fc972939a-->Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* #10102 ([experimental] Multiprocess bitcoin by ryanofsky)

If you consider this pull request important, please also help to review the conflicting pull requests. Ideally, start with the one that should be merged first.

events.body: Can you add a python test on this? You can probably highjack https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/78dae8caccd82cfbfd76557f1fb7d7557c7b5edb/test/functional/feature_uacomment.py by trying to set a chinese char.

```

Minor nit:

```
2018-09-13 21:33:38 clang-tidy(pr=13883): src/bitcoin-cli.cpp:18:1: warning: #includes are not sorted properly [llvm-include-order]

Would you prefer to put tuple after stdio.h? I think we should seperate C and C++ headers.
I don't think we separate C and C++ headers elsewhere, but please sort them.
